tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_experience (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sales_team_contact VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    marketing_team_contact VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    customer_support_contact VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sales_team (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_team (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_support_team (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_touchpoints ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_id INT, 
    touchpoint_date DATE, 
    touchpoint_type VARCHAR(50), 
    interaction_details TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE Collaborations (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sales_id INT NOT NULL,
  marketing_id INT NOT NULL,
  support_id INT NOT NULL,
  touchpoint_id INT NOT NULL
);
